Articles.Content:
Hello Folks, Kerbal Carriers Limited is proud to present one of the finest pieces of road hardware ever to come out of a Kerban factory, the Knomad! Equipped with four wheel drive, air conditioning, a spacious sleeping unit, and all the latest technical gadgetry, the Knomad is sure to have something for every Kerbal. Clocked at a blistering 45 mph on the KC Limited test track, the Knomad handles like a dream and corners like the high performance vehicle it is! For purchasing information please see the KC limited link below.

KC Limited's Knomad Catalog: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kc-450-knomad-sport-ute/

And now, what you've been waiting for, a sneak peak at the illustrious KC 450 Knomad Sport Ute!
Cool! I really like it! Simple, yet beautiful!

@qromodynmc & jmiki8 thanks!

@Vicomt Yeah, the parachute is supposed to be the dashboard/airbag. Can't really see it well, but the large battery is supposed to be the center console and the antenna on it is supposed to be a shifter.
Looks good and simple, which in my opinion simple is better.
